\n <p>Lets everyone know about the new:
Vertel iedereen over het nieuwe kanaal,
ook als je ze niet toevoegt.
If checked, only users with an e-mail ad: If checked, only users with an e-mail address ending in these domains will be able to join the organization.

\n Configure regular expression pat:
Configure regular expression patterns that will be
      automatically linkified when used in Zulip message bodies or
      topics.  For example to automatically linkify commit IDs and
      issue numbers (e.g. #123) to the corresponding items in a GitHub
      project, you could use the following:
Mobile push notifications always (even w: Mobiele push meldingen altijd (ook als je off-line bent)
\n <b>Streams</b> are like chat r: Kanalen zijn als chat rooms of distributielijsten. Je kunt eraan meedoen, ze verlaten, en ze maken.
Display user list on left side in narrow: Toon de gebruikers links in beperkte vensters.
This is a <span class=\"icon-vector-glob: Dit is een openbaar kanaal. Iedereen binnen je organisatie kan meedoen.

A stream with this name already exists: Er bestaat al een kanaal met deze naam

This organization is configured to restr: This organization is configured to restrict editing of message content to __minutes_to_edit__ minutes after it is sent.
If non-zero, users can edit their messag: If non-zero, users can edit their message for this many minutes after it is sent. If zero, users can edit all their past messages.
Only Admins may now add new emoji!: Alleen beheerders mogen nu nieuwe emojis toevoegen!
Pin stream to top of left sidebar: Pin stream to top of left sidebar
Alert words allow you to be notified as: Alert words allow you to be notified as if you were @-mentioned when certain words or phrases are used in Zulip.

Any user may now add new emoji!: Iedere gebruiker mag nu nieuwe emojis toevoegen!
Their password will be cleared from our: Their password will be cleared from our systems, and any bots they maintain will be disabled.
\n <p class=\"api-key-note\">For: For most bots using the API, you'll want to give each bot its own name and API key using the above section. But if you want to write a bot that can access your own private messages, you should use your personal API key.

<p>Messages in __page_params.product_nam: Berichten in __page_params.product_name__ gaan naar een kanaal en hebben een onderwerp.
Muted streams don't show up in your home: Muted streams don't show up in your home view or generate notifications unless you are mentioned.
__lang__ is now the default language! Y: __lang__ is nu de standaardtaal!  Je moet het venster opnieuw laden om het effect te zien

\n The <b>topic</b> of a conversa: The topic of a conversation is one or two words that describe what it is about, for example: Bug #345, lunch, or logo. Don't overthink it.
